tools.name: Create Document
tools.description: Creates a new document file on the user's desktop

filename.description: Base name of the file without extension (e.g., 'todos', 'meeting-notes')

content.description: Content to write to the file, properly formatted for the file type (markdown for .md, plain text for .txt, etc.)

extension.description: File extension (e.g., '.txt', '.json', '.md'). Defaults to .md if not specified

tools.ai_description:
Use this tool when the user asks you to create a document. IMPORTANT: Format the content properly based on the file type - for .md files use markdown with proper headers and lists (e.g., '# Title

- Item 1
- Item 2'), for .txt use plain text, for .json use valid JSON. If the user doesn't specify an extension, use .md and format as markdown. The filename should NOT include the extension - just the base name (e.g., 'todos' not 'todos.md'). Convert apostrophes in filenames to hyphens (e.g., 'to-do's' becomes 'to-dos'). Always format lists with proper markdown bullets or numbers.

ai_instructions.system_prompt_addition: You have access to tools that can perform actions on the user's behalf. When a user requests an action that matches a tool's capability, use the appropriate tool. Always explain what you're about to do before using a tool.
